alert.note: Alert for Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 08 at 2:16PM CST until February 08 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR EXTREME GRASSLAND FIRE DANGER FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 050... The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a Red Flag Warning for extreme grassland fire danger, which is in effect until 6 PM CST this evening. * Extreme Grassland Fire Danger...Is forecast. * Winds...North 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 17 percent. * Highest threat...is located where little, if any, snow occurred recently. * Impacts...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly and become difficult to control. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this fire weather product.
